gridsim.fta
Interface FTAllocPolicy

All Known Implementing Classes:
PerfectCheckPointing
public interface FTAllocPolicy

This is the interface for allocation policy with failure

Since:
GridSim Toolkit 5.0
Author:
Bahman Javadi
See Also:
gridsim.FTAGridResource, AllocPolicy

Method Summary
 void setGridletsFailed(int failedMachID)
          Sets the status of all Gridlets in this machine to FAILED.
 boolean setGridletsResumed(int failedMachID)
          Sets the status of all Gridlets in this machine to RESUME.
 

Method Detail

setGridletsFailed

void setGridletsFailed(int failedMachID)
Sets the status of all Gridlets in this machine to FAILED. Then sends them back to users, and clean up the relevant lists.

Parameters:
failedMachID - the id of the failed machine

setGridletsResumed

boolean setGridletsResumed(int failedMachID)
Sets the status of all Gridlets in this machine to RESUME. Then sends them back to users, and clean up the relevant lists.

Parameters:
failedMachID - the id of the failed machine
